RelatedSentence: If you have an idea for an app or gadget to improve New Yorkers ' quality of life and have n't yet entered the city 's 2014 BigApps competition , it 's time to get moving .

The four - month contest aims to engage leading minds in tech , business and design to solve the city 's biggest problems .
The four - month contest aims to engage leading minds in tech , business and design to solve the city 's biggest problems .
It was launched by the New York City Economic Development Corporation on May 7 and ends in September , with finalists chosen in mid-July .
